p: According to a report titled “Global Herbal Medicine Market Research Report—Forecast To 2023” by Market Research Future, the herbal medicine market is expected to reach USD 111 billion by the end of 2023 [ 91]. The global herbal medicine market is projected to grow at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of ~7.2 % from 2017 to 2023 [ 92].
